name: Game of Thrones - A Telltale Games Series

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Game of Thrones - Season 1/Thrones.exe
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: winemenubuilder.exe
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    args: /verysilent /RESTARTEXITCODE=0 /SP- /NORESTART /NOICONS /CLOSEAPPLICATIONS
      /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
